additional_requirement: discuss scenarios with conflicting ethical principles
include ambiguous cases where regulations contradict or are unclear
focus on hypothetical future technologies without current regulation
explore the conflict between user behavior and privacy concerns
analyze the ethical implications of technologies that can be used both for civilian and military purposes
discuss psychological and ethical impacts of manipulation in immersive environments
focus on tactics that blur the lines between state and non-state actions
discuss when ethical hacking might cross ethical boundaries
explore the ethical and safety implications of misusing biometric data
